page.shortlink: api desktop api edit menu functions
page.description: Here are Edit Menu functions available in Alpha Anywhere:

case.title: Undo
case.description: [undo]. Restores the edit buffer to its state before the last keystrokes.

case.title: Redo
case.description: [redo]. Restores the edit buffer to its state before an Undo operation.

case.title: Cut
case.description: [cut]. Removes the selected page elements to the Windows Clipboard.

case.title: Copy
case.description: [copy]. Copies the selected page elements to the Windows Clipboard.

case.title: Paste
case.description: [paste]. Pastes the contents of the Windows Clipboard to the cursor location.

case.title: Select All
case.description: [select]. Selects all the elements in the edit buffer.

case.title: Copy to Scrapbook
case.description: [copyto]. Only available when the Source tab is selected. Copies the selected text to the Scrapbook library of the Code Library.

case.title: Paste from Scrapbook
case.description: [pastefrom]. Pastes the currently selected entry in the Scrapbook library of the Code Library at the cursor location.

case.title: Find
case.description: [find]. Only available when the Source tab is selected. Displays the Find/Replace/Goto dialog, which allows the operator to search for and replace text in the edit buffer.

case.title: Check Spelling
case.description: [check]. Displays the Spell Check dialog, which supports interactive spell checking of the contents of the edit buffer.
